I hope it's permitted to mention this here. If not, please will a moderator vaporize my post.
 
 Some friends of mine and I are working on creating a web site which will be a kind of on line encyclopedia of libertarian and conservative thought.
 
 Everyone would find it useful: conservatives and libertarians for obvious reasons, liberals and Lefties to know what the Enemy is thinking.
 
 More information at the site which is my signature line, below.
 
 Doug

post_info.post_title: On OnLine Encyclopedia of Libertarian and Conservative Thought

Isn't that called the conservapedia? You can read all about how evolution is not a science, there is no global warming and other such conservative talking points.
